title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: Appending N lines to the StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
OB: The entire client area is getting redrawn when appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode.
EB: Modify the performPaint method in StyledText to include the following line of code: System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
SR: To investigate the redraws, add the following line of code to the performPaint method in StyledText: System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
